name: Buggy Driver
description:
Entry for Wowie Jam 2.0. (Theme: Intentional Bugs)

How to Play:

-Use A and D or arrow keys to steer

-Press R to restart

-Try collect all the cubes with missing textures!

I quite enjoyed working on this jam game since the chosen theme was pretty interesting and forced me to let go of quality and concentrate on the fun aspect, as it should be with small prototypes like this. I created everything in two days using Unity and Blender.

btw press 1 + 2  for weird things...
